title: Jira: Activación automática
description: This n8n workflow uses 1 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks and ensuring consistent data flow.

title: Code: Activación automática (Workflow avanzado - 10 pasos)
description: Automatización que se activa cuando ocurren eventos en Code y integra 5 servicios, realiza 5 tipos de acciones.
